message: This is heartbreaking. Venezuela had every opportunity to be something with its rich resources. Greed and corruption has reduced it to this. A civilization/country is judged by how it treats it most vunerable (young and old). So sad.

How anyone can say President Obama is anything but amazing blows my mind. He has worked tirelessly to improve the quality of our lives. He has led the world with class and diplomacy. He has not had any support from a Congress with a 13% approval rating. God bless him and his family.

Recycle one of his rockets shot in the sea and the next time he launches one drop the recycled N.Korea rocket on downtown PingPong with writing on the side in Korean that says stop littering the oceans .

ARE YOU SERIOUS?!?!?!? Why not $53 million to fix the infrastructure or aid with increasing homelessness and theft in the whole downtown area of LONG BEACH! Why attract tourists to a dirty city? RIDICULOUS!!!!

I am a consumer and trump understands the consumer. My buying power has fallen below my parents and grandparents. We are in debt up to our eyes. Trump understands and is not liked by either the RNC or The DNC so fight for us Trump. And we will fight for you.

It's a kid thing. Everything in moderation, including gaming. That they treat it as a crime is rather silly I think. That the child is obsessed with it most likely means that there's something big missing in his life. What kind of person will that experience mold?

This is about the Federal Government illegally seizing land. If you layman cannot see the significance of their protest, I'll spell it out. This is about the little guy standing up to the big guy.
